title: PowRL: A Reinforcement Learning Framework for Robust Management of Power Networks. (arXiv:2212.02397v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Power grids, across the world, play an important societal and economical role by providing uninterrupted, reliable and transient-free power to several industries, businesses and household consumers. With the advent of renewable power resources and EVs resulting into uncertain generation and highly dynamic load demands, it has become ever so important to ensure robust operation of power networks through suitable management of transient stability issues and localize the events of blackouts. translated_title: PowRL：用于稳健管理电力网络的强化学习框架
translated_abstract: 世界各地的电力网络通过为多个行业、企业和家庭消费者提供不间断、可靠和无暂态电力发挥着重要的社会和经济作用。随着可再生能源和电动车产生的不确定发电和高度动态负载需求的出现，通过适当的瞬态稳定问题管理来确保电力网络的稳健运行变得越来越重要，并将停电事件限制在地方范围内。本文引入了一个名为PowRL的强化学习（RL）框架，以缓解意外网络事件的影响，并可靠地在网络上随时维持电力。PowRL利用新颖的超负荷管理启发式以及基于RL提供的最优拓扑选择决策，以确保电网在变化和不确定条件下安全、可靠地运行（无超载线路和无停电事件）。
tldr: 本论文提出了PowRL框架来通过强化学习来有效应对电力网络中的不确定情况，并保持电网的可靠运行。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a reinforcement learning framework, PowRL, to effectively address the uncertainties in power networks and maintain reliable operation of the grid.
